Name: The Appraiser
About the game: The Appraiser is a short story about an old man and his art gallery of four artist. You are an art appraiser requested to sell off the collection as the gallery shuts down. However, the old man is fond his curation and wishes you to judge these paintings a little differently... Each painting contains a poem. A small peek at each artist's thoughts and feelings. As the appraiser, it is up to you to judge each piece of art. These glimpses may help you make your decisions. Explore This art gallery is not like many. It is rundown and is more akin to a house. As you explore the gallery, you may learn why that is. Behind The Artist Thanks to the old man, you have gained the power of intuition. You are now able to hear and see each artists thoughts and feelings. However, your power is limited and you won't have enough for each painting. Be careful choosing which piece you wish to learn more about. Saying Goodbye Your job is to sell these paintings. You don't need to sell all of them, but a certain amount is expected. Which paintings you wish to part with is up to you. FAQ How long is The Appraiser? The Appraiser is a short game and will need to be replayed more than once. It will likely take most players a bit over an hour to 100% the game. Is The Appraiser a horror game? The Appraiser is not a horror game. What kind of game is The Appraiser? The Appraiser is an experimental narrative game similar to a walking simulator. If you enjoy unconventional storytelling and experimental game design, The Appraiser may be for you!
